tool_description: ASOS | Online Shopping for the Latest Clothes & Fashion
name: ASOS
title: ASOS

api_list.name: Test
api_list.description: To check if API is up and running.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://asos10.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asos10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://asos10.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/test"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asos10.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Product List By SearchTerm
api_list.description: This endpoint will provide a list of all production by searchTerm.

optional_parameters.name: priceMin
optional_parameters.description: Filter the list by Min Price

optional_parameters.name: facets
priceMax
optional_parameters.description: Filter the list by Max Price

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Filter the list by Sort parameters

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of products per page

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The offset to skip products that have already been viewed

api_list.name: Get Return Charges
api_list.description: Get Current return charges and policy from ASOS.

api_list.name: Get ProductList
api_list.description: This endpoint will provide a list of all production by categoryId.

optional_parameters.name: priceMin
optional_parameters.description: Filter the list by Min Price

optional_parameters.name: priceMax
optional_parameters.description: Filter the list by Max Price

optional_parameters.name: facets
sort
optional_parameters.description: Filter the list by Sort parameters

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of products per page

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The offset to skip products that have already been viewed

api_list.name: Get You Might Also Like
api_list.description: This endpoint will provide a list of production that you may also be interested in.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: **productId** can be retrieved from **api/v1/getProductList** (Get ProductList) or **api/v1/getProductListBySearchTerm** (Get Product List By SearchTerm) or **api/v1/getProductListByPhoto** (Get Product List By Photo)

api_list.name: Get People Also Bought
api_list.description: This endpoint will provide a list of production that are bought by other customers.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: **productId** can be retrieved from **api/v1/getProductList** (Get ProductList) or **api/v1/getProductListBySearchTerm** (Get Product List By SearchTerm) or **api/v1/getProductListByPhoto** (Get Product List By Photo)

api_list.name: Auto Suggestion
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestion by product name.

api_list.name: Get Product SaveCount
api_list.description: Get saved count of the product.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: **productId** can be retrieved from **api/v1/getProductList** (Get ProductList) or **api/v1/getProductListBySearchTerm** (Get Product List By SearchTerm) or **api/v1/getProductListByPhoto** (Get Product List By Photo)

api_list.name: Get Buy The Look
api_list.description: This endpoint will give a list of the production according to the appearance of the current product.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: **productId** can be retrieved from **api/v1/getProductList** (Get ProductList) or **api/v1/getProductListBySearchTerm** (Get Product List By SearchTerm) or **api/v1/getProductListByPhoto** (Get Product List By Photo)

api_list.name: Get Stock Price
api_list.description: Retrieve the price list for the product.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: **productId** can be retrieved from **api/v1/getProductList** (Get ProductList) or **api/v1/getProductListBySearchTerm** (Get Product List By SearchTerm) or **api/v1/getProductListByPhoto** (Get Product List By Photo)

api_list.name: Get Product Details
api_list.description: Get detailed information about the product with id.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: **productId** can be retrieved from **api/v1/getProductList** (Get ProductList) or **api/v1/getProductListBySearchTerm** (Get Product List By SearchTerm) or **api/v1/getProductListByPhoto** (Get Product List By Photo)

api_list.name: Get Categories
api_list.description: Get a list of all the categories available on ASOS.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://asos10.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCategories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asos10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
